message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.IR. 

The paper focuses on person re-identification, which is a computer vision task, and proposes a novel network architecture that combines visual and language representations. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also uses an image captioner to generate language descriptions, which falls under cs.CL (Computation and Language). The proposed network also involves learning from both images and captions jointly, which could be related to cs.LG (Machine Learning). The experiments are conducted on benchmark datasets, which could be categorized under cs.MM (Multimedia). Finally, the paper involves domain transfer, which could be related to cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
